### Clone Repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/shr3k/odyssey-theme
```

### Navigate to Template Directory

```bash
cd odyssey-theme
```

### Install Dependencies & Start Development Server

```bash
pnpm install
pnpm dev
```

<Callout>
  **Note:** NPM is not recommended for this template due to potential issues
  with peer dependencies. Please use PNPM or Yarn for the best experience.
</Callout>

## What is this?

This is a landing page template for an AI agent startup. The template is built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Motion, optimized for showcasing AI agent services.

## Who is this for?

You are launching a new AI agent startup and need a professional, eye-catching landing page to showcase your services. This template is designed to convert visitors into users.

## Features

- 1x Landing Page with 9 sections
  - Header Section
  - Hero Section
  - Logos Section
  - Features Bento Grid Section
  - Testimonials Section
  - Pricing Section
  - FAQ Section
  - CTA Section
  - Footer Section
- Dark mode support
- 100% Mobile responsive
- Full SEO coverage
- Dynamic OpenGraph images for every page
- Tons of animations / micro-interactions
- Clean and maintainable code
- Global constants and variables for color, text, and more

## Dependencies

- Next.js 15.2.2
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Lucide React
